select.info: You can query the number of inhabitants for both the Free Hanseatic City of Hamburg and the Hamburg metropolitan region.

result.confidentialityHint: Taking confidentiality into account, the following value was calculated
result.confidentialityHintSmallValues: For data protection reasons, small numbers of cases under 3 are not changed.
result.populationMRH: Population in the metropolitan region excluding Hamburg
result.dataSourceFHHValue: Inhabitants with main residence, population register
result.sourceAreaOutside: Parts of the search area lie outside the boundaries of the Hamburg metropolitan region and were not taken into account for the calculation of the number of inhabitants.
result.dataSourceMRHKey: Data source Metropolitan region without Hamburg
result.dataSourceMRHValue: Total population in 100 metre grid, census 2011. Status of census data 09.05.2011.

noFeatures.nothingSelected: There are no {{objects}} selected for the comparison list.
noFeatures.info: Click on an object on the map. A window opens with the respective factual information. In the upper right corner there is a star symbol {{iconEmptyStar}}. Click on this icon to add the object to the comparison list. The star icon will be colored yellow {{iconYellowStar}}. Click the star icon again to remove the object from the comparison list.

feedback.added: {{object}} was added to the comparison list
feedback.notAdded: {{object}} could not be added to the comparison list
feedback.limitReached: The maximum number of objects in the comparison list has been reached.
feedback.removeObjects: Please remove at least one object before proceeding.
